Even though we ordered two pairs of the exact same jeans in the exact same fit and color in the same order, we got two different pairs of jeans. They are labeled as both being the Amanda fit and both being the Portland color, but they are made of two very different materials and are different shades. One is produced in China and one in Bangladesh, so that is likely the cause of the difference. Just a heads-up that "identical" orders do not always receive "identical" products.
